meanings.definition: Capable of being written on or inscribed
meanings.sent1: The whiteboard is writable, so we can jot down our ideas easily.
meanings.sent2: The notebook paper is writable with a pen or pencil.
meanings.sent3: The writable surface of the chalkboard tempted the mischievous student to draw a funny face.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a blank page, waiting for inspiration to make it writable.
meanings.sent5: The writable tablet allowed the artist to express their creativity digitally.

meanings.sent1: The writable index cards are perfect for making flashcards.
meanings.sent2: The writable labels make it easy to organize the files.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's writable whiteboard became a canvas for colorful diagrams.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a writable surface, waiting for her to leave a lasting message.
meanings.sent5: The writable sticky notes helped her remember important tasks throughout the day.

meanings.definition: Able to be recorded or saved on a computer or other electronic device
meanings.sent1: The writable CD allowed him to burn his favorite songs for the road trip.
meanings.sent2: The writable DVD stored all the precious memories of the family vacation.
meanings.sent3: The writable memory card held the key to unlocking the mystery in the game.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a writable file, saved in his memory forever.
meanings.sent5: The writable USB drive contained the important presentation for the meeting.
